text: opened in Akita, Akita Prefecture, Japan in 1990. Located in the grounds of Kubota Castle in , the collection relates to the Satake clan, daimyō of the Akita Domain. ==See also== * List of Historic Sites of Japan (Akita) * Akita Prefectural Museum * Akita Senshū Museum of Art ==References== ==External links== * Satake Historical Museum Category:Buildings and structures in Akita (city) Category:Museums in Akita Prefecture Category:Museums established in 1990 Category:1990 establishments in Japan Category:Satake clan
title: Satake Historical Museum
